alert.note: Alert for Bourbon (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 12:00PM EST until January 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Stoner Creek at Paris affecting Bourbon County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Stoner Creek at Paris. * WHEN...From late this afternoon to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water floods a few low roads on right bank of creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Sunday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 18.4. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued tonight.
